topComments.author: Brad Shaffer
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) 5 - Experi√™ncia incr√≠vel de estrelas. O passeio de barco foi r√°pido, semelhante a pegar um t√°xi do outro lado da rua. Se eu tivesse um caiaque eu teria usado. Mas ent√£o como eu levaria todas as coisas da praia... As balsas saem a cada vinte minutos. Em meados de junho, a √°gua estava clara e quente. Tenha em mente as mar√©s, pois a mar√© alta oferece a melhor clareza e profundidade. Chuveiros e banheiros externos eram convenientes e limpos. Fomos em um dia de semana, ent√£o n√£o estava muito ocupado. Embale o que voc√™ precisa porque n√£o h√° comida ou √°gua na ilha. Voc√™ pode at√© embalar um vag√£o, se quiser. Sem √°lcool na ilha e voc√™ pode estar sujeito a uma revista casual de seus refrigeradores.  (Original) 5 - Star awesome experience. The boat ride was quick, similar to taking a taxi across the street. If I had a kayak I would have used it. But then how would I carry all the beach stuff‚Ä¶ Ferrys run every twenty minutes. Mid June so the water was clear and warm. Snorkeling was great on the east side by the rock piles. Hundreds of fish crabs and what not. Swim depth for all ages. Keep in mind the tides as high tide gives the best clarity and depth. Outside showers and bathrooms were convenient and clean. We went on a week day so it was not too busy. Pack what you need because there is no food or water on the island. You can even pack a wagon if you choose. No alcohol on the island and you may be subject to a casual search of your coolers.
